translations: n.扳道员；能干的组织者；转辙员；手腕好的人

phrs.translation: 扳道员, 转辙工, 调车机车, 转辙器

sentences.sentence: According to Mr Hiller, his shunter has to withstand decelerations of 5g (ie, five times the force of the Earth’s gravitational field).
sentences.translation: 根据Hiller的说法，他的新调列车头要能承受得起5g的反向加速度（也就是5倍于地球重力）。

sentences.sentence: According to Mr Hiller, his shunter has to withstand decelerations of 5g (ie, five times the force of the Earth's gravitational field).
sentences.translation: 根据Hiller的说法，他的新调列车头要能承受得起5g的反向加速度（也就是5倍于地球重力）。

sentences.sentence: They have converted an old heavy shunter into a hybrid, slashing its fuel consumption by 40-50%, according to Klaus Hiller, who is in charge of the project.
sentences.translation: 公司相关项目负责人Klaus Hiller称，他们已经将一部旧式的重型调列车头改装为混合动力的型号，使其燃料消耗量猛降40 - 50%。
